mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PROJECT_CAFE_INFO (CAFE_ID, CAFE_NAME, USER_ID, CAFE_EXPLANATION, CAFE_TITLE_NUM, CAFE_FRONT, CAFE_SKIN, CAFE_LAYOUT, CAFE_JOIN_APPLY, CAFE_JOIN_GENDER, CAFE_JOIN_AGE, CAFE_JOIN_INFORMATION, CAFE_ICON_NUM, CAFE_REGDATE) VALUES (#{cafeId}, #{cafeName}, #{userId}, #{cafeExplanation}, #{cafeTitleNum}, #{cafeFront}, #{cafeSkin}, #{cafeLayout}, #{cafeJoinApply}, #{cafeJoinGender}, #{cafeJoinAge}, #{cafeJoinInformation}, #{cafeIconNum}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) ID_COUNT FROM PROJECT_CAFE_INFO WHERE CAFE_ID = #{cafeId}
SELECT COUNT(*) TOTAL_COUNT FROM (SELECT * FROM PROJECT_CAFE_INFO WHERE CAFE_NAME LIKE '%' || #{cafeName} || '%') CAFE

SELECT CAFE.*, NVL2(CAFE_MEMBER.USER_ID, 'true', 'false') IS_CAFE_MEMBER, (CASE WHEN CAFE.USER_ID = #{loginId} THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END) IS_CAFE_MANAGER, #{loginId} LOGIN_ID FROM (SELECT * FROM PROJECT_CAFE_INFO WHERE CAFE_ID = #{cafeId}) CAFE LEFT JOIN (SELECT CAFE_ID, USER_ID FROM PROJECT_CAFE_MEMBER WHERE USER_ID = #{loginId}) CAFE_MEMBER ON CAFE.CAFE_ID = CAFE_MEMBER.CAFE_ID
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PROJECT_JOIN_QUESTION (CAFE_QUESTION_NUM, CAFE_ID, CAFE_QUESTION_CONTENT) VALUES (#{cafeQuestionNum}, #{cafeId}, #{cafeQuestionContent})

SELECT NVL(SUM(hit), 0) count FROM (SELECT * FROM project_board_type WHERE cafe_id = #{cafeId}) boardMenu INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM project_board WHERE TO_CHAR(board_savedate, 'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'YYYYMMDD')) board ON boardMenu.board_menu_num = board.board_menu_num

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY BOARD_NUM DESC) rn, board.*, boardMenu.BOARD_MENU_TYPE FROM (SELECT * FROM PROJECT_BOARD_TYPE WHERE BOARD_READ_AUTH = 0 AND BOARD_PUBLIC_FLAG = 'Y' AND NOT BOARD_MENU_NUM IN(4, 6) AND CAFE_ID = #{cafeId}) boardMenu INNER JOIN PROJECT_BOARD board ON boardMenu.BOARD_MENU_NUM = board.BOARD_MENU_NUM ) WHERE rn BETWEEN 1 AND 10

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY BOARD_NUM DESC) rn, board.*, boardMenu.BOARD_MENU_TYPE FROM (SELECT * FROM PROJECT_BOARD_TYPE WHERE BOARD_READ_AUTH = 0 AND BOARD_PUBLIC_FLAG = 'Y' AND NOT BOARD_MENU_NUM IN(4, 6) AND CAFE_ID = #{cafeId}) boardMenu INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM PROJECT_BOARD WHERE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(BOARD_SAVEDATE, 'YYYMMDD')) board ON boardMenu.BOARD_MENU_NUM = board.BOARD_MENU_NUM ) WHERE rn BETWEEN 1 AND 10

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY board.BOARD_NUM DESC) rn, board.*, boardMenu.BOARD_MENU_TYPE FROM (SELECT * FROM PROJECT_BOARD_TYPE WHERE BOARD_READ_AUTH = 0 AND BOARD_PUBLIC_FLAG = 'Y' AND NOT BOARD_MENU_NUM IN(4, 6) AND CAFE_ID = #{cafeId}) boardMenu INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM PROJECT_BOARD) board ON boardMenu.BOARD_MENU_NUM = board.BOARD_MENU_NUM INNER JOIN (SELECT distinct(board_num) board_num FROM PROJECT_REPLY WHERE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(REPLY_SAVEDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')) reply ON board.BOARD_NUM = reply.BOARD_NUM ) WHERE rn BETWEEN 1 AND 10
